attributes.action: Accept the offer to Join the EU Joint Procurement Agreement.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the Government is putting it's own interests i.e. Looking bad to its Brexit voters, above the countries in a time of National Emergency.
attributes.background:
The EU scheme uses the EU's joint procurement agreement, to help member countries acquire the medical supplies needed to tackle cross-border pandemics.

The UK was invited last week to join but declined saying they were not in the EU.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310166

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
